casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Malin, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Malin (1994), 71 Ohio St.3d 285.]

(No. 94-1755 Submitted October 24, 1994 Decided December 21, 1994.) Stephanie Tubbs Jones, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Elaine Welsh, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Chester W. Malin, pro se. *286 Per Curiam.

The decision of the court of appeals is affirmed for the reasons stated therein.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
